Row.Text: The Blood Countess

A minister in our court has spoken up against the Countess Elizabeth Báthory, accusing her of wicked crimes against the Hungarian people. He alleges that the Countess has an insatisable obsession with torture and death, and that, at her hands, countless young women - of noble and common birth alike - have been tortured to death. These crimes are very serious, and we must not let them go unpunished if true.[NEWLINE]
Investigate these claims.
Disregard these claims.
[ICON_BULLET][COLOR_NEGATIVE_TEXT]Lose {1_Num} [ICON_GOLD] Gold[ENDCOLOR][NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET][COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]Gain {2_Num} [ICON_GOLDEN_AGE] Golden Age points[ENDCOLOR]
[ICON_BULLET][COLOR_NEGATIVE_TEXT]Lose {1_Num} [ICON_GOLDEN_AGE] Golden Age points[ENDCOLOR][NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET][COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]Gain {2_Num} [ICON_CULTURE] Culture[ENDCOLOR]

Our investigation into claims of serial murder against the Countess Elizabeth Báthory have turned up truth: a list of some 640 deaths has been unearthed and attributed to the Countess. She will be brought to the Capital and tried by the highest court in the land.
We have disregarded claims of serial murder against the Countess Elizabeth Báthory. Business as usual then.
The Countess Elizabeth Báthory has been convicted of serial murder in Hungary.
A Foreign Hero

A foreign commander, General Józef Bem, has recently become a hero to the Hungarian people for his courageous efforts to fight within our armies against our enemies. General Bem is known throughout for his military achievements, and we are fortunate that he fights for our cause. We should have him commemorated for his efforts.[NEWLINE]
Promote General Bem to the ranks of Hungary's commanders.
Decorate General Bem with the highest Hungarian honour.
We shall afford no national honours to a foreigner.

[ICON_BULLET][COLOR_NEGATIVE_TEXT]Lose {1_Num} [ICON_CULTURE] Culture[NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET][COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]Gain a free Great General with additional Sight and [ICON_MOVES] Moves and which ignores enemy Zone of Control[ENDCOLOR]
[ICON_BULLET][COLOR_NEGATIVE_TEXT]Lose {1_Num} [ICON_CULTURE] Culture[NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET][COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]Gain a free Great General[ENDCOLOR]
[ICON_BULLET][COLOR_NEGATIVE_TEXT]A foreign civilization receives a free Great General[ENDCOLOR]
We have promoted General Józef Bem to join the ranks of our highest commanders.
We have decorated General Józef Bem with our highest honour.
We have ignored the efforts of General Józef Bem, so he has chosen to desert our empire and serve elsewhere.
Józef Bem
National Hero
Ignores Zone of Control. +1 Sight and +1 [ICON_MOVES] Movement.
